title: Luke Pollard – 2022 Comments After Andrew Western Wins Stretford and Urmston By-Election for Labour
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Luke Pollard, the Labour MP for Plymouth Sutton and Devonport, on Twitter on 16 December 2022.
content:
Congratulations ⁦Andrew Western⁩ for winning the Stretford and Urmston by-election. Another good result for Labour and a bad result for Rishi Sunak’s Conservatives. Bring on the General Election.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
